value.sellError: **{userTag}**, please specify the item number from your inventory followed by the number of bepis you want to sell the item
value.buyError: **{userTag}**, please specify a valid item number from the shop
value.buySuccess: **{userTag}**, you have bought **{itemName}** from **{sellerTag}** for {paidCoins} bepis
value.buyNotEnoughCoins: **{userTag}**, you don't have enough bepis to buy the item
value.sellErrorCoins: **{userTag}**, please enter a value greater than 0 for bepis
value.unSellError: **{userTag}**, please specify the item number from your inventory.
value.catchWaitMessage: üö´ **{userTag}**, you need to wait another **{hours} hours, {minutes} minutes, and {seconds} seconds** before catching another Shibe
value.giveAwayError: **{userTag}**, please specify the item number from your inventory
value.giveAwayMessage: "**{userTag}**, you received {receivedCoins} bepis for **{itemName}**. Now you have {totalCoins} bepis!"
value.giveAwayErrorShop: **{userTag}**, you can't give away items that are currently for sale in the shop
value.newTrick: Teaches new keyword to execute a function
value.invShowHelp: Shows an item from the inventory
value.invTrashHelp: Removes an item from the inventory
value.tradeSellHelp: Sells an item from the inventory
value.tradeUnSellHelp: Stops selling an item from the inventory
value.tradeBuyHelp: Buys an item from the shop
value.tradeGiveHelp: Releases an item from your inventory in exchanage for a reward

help: Indicates the level of difficulty from 1-5 for items to be randomly chosen (5 is very difficult)
